about_the_game:
Since ancient times, there have been dark beings, demons, that harbor grudges against humans.

Even in modern times, they still exist.

However... there are also those who protect people from these demons.

They are called "exorcists" and have been battling demons since ancient times.

The current head of the prestigious exorcist family, the Kuranashi (Dark Void) family, is "Kuranashi Mari."

One day, Mari rescues a girl named "Aikawa Hiyori" who was attacked by demons.

To help Hiyori, who has lost her exorcist powers due to a womb tattoo,

Mari dedicates herself to the battle against the demons...

This is a classic turn-based RPG with a command-style interface.

The design is straightforward even for RPG beginners!

・Defeat Scenes (H-Scenes)

If Mari's health points (HP) reach zero in battle, she is defeated,

and will be raped by her opponent.

The higher Mari's Ero level is, the more explicit and debauched Mari becomes.

Additionally, in some scenes, specific Debuffs will lead to unique variations.

・Event Scenes (H-Events)

During map exploration, choosing certain options highlighted in pink may lead to "H Events"

where Mari is either forced or asked to do lewd things.

These scenes primarily involve interactions with humans, and similar to defeat scenes,

the higher Mari's Ero level is, the more explicit her actions become.

Similar to defeat scenes, some events may have unique variations based on specific debuffs.

Furthermore, if Mari's Ero level reaches the maximum of 3, additional scenes may occur.

・Combat H

During combat, attacks from demons have a chance of breaking Mari's armor,

and once demons use H attack after that, "Combat H" will be triggered.

When receiving H attack, Mari's Energy(EP) will be absorbed by demons, and her Ecstasy and Ero level will increase.

In addition, in some combat H, specific Debuffs will lead to unique variations.

・Ecstasy System

When receiving H attack in combat, "Ecstasy" will increase.

When Ecstasy reaches 100, Mari cums and becomes unable to move for one turn.

However, her energy will be replenished, and her Max EP, ATK, and SP(Sorcery ATK) will increase by 1.

・Lust System

When receiving H attacks, being raped after defeated, and doing lewd things in Events,

Mari's "Lust" will increase.

When Lust is at a certain degree, "Ero Level" will increase, and Mari's reaction in H Scenes will change correspondingly.

・Debuff System

Among the demons, some can apply Debuffs on Mari.

When receiving these attacks, Debuffs such as "Lactating" or "Infested" might be applied.

These Debuffs will not only put Mari at a disadvantage in combat, but also trigger specific H Scenes that have unique variations.

  • Operate with either mouse or keyboard.

  • Pressing the shift key during battle activates auto-battle. Pressing it again reverts the command.

  • Ero Status and Memory Room are also available.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains  non-consensual sex,  sexual acts,   genital nudity scenes, sexual assault, Interspecies Sex, LGBT, BDSM, etc. It is not suitable for all ages. All characters in this work are over 20 years old.

detailed_description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

Since ancient times, there have been dark beings, demons, that harbor grudges against humans.

Even in modern times, they still exist.

However... there are also those who protect people from these demons.

They are called "exorcists" and have been battling demons since ancient times.

The current head of the prestigious exorcist family, the Kuranashi (Dark Void) family, is "Kuranashi Mari."

One day, Mari rescues a girl named "Aikawa Hiyori" who was attacked by demons.

To help Hiyori, who has lost her exorcist powers due to a womb tattoo,

Mari dedicates herself to the battle against the demons...

This is a classic turn-based RPG with a command-style interface.

The design is straightforward even for RPG beginners!

・Defeat Scenes (H-Scenes)

If Mari's health points (HP) reach zero in battle, she is defeated,

and will be raped by her opponent.

The higher Mari's Ero level is, the more explicit and debauched Mari becomes.

Additionally, in some scenes, specific Debuffs will lead to unique variations.

・Event Scenes (H-Events)

During map exploration, choosing certain options highlighted in pink may lead to "H Events"

where Mari is either forced or asked to do lewd things.

These scenes primarily involve interactions with humans, and similar to defeat scenes,

the higher Mari's Ero level is, the more explicit her actions become.

Similar to defeat scenes, some events may have unique variations based on specific debuffs.

Furthermore, if Mari's Ero level reaches the maximum of 3, additional scenes may occur.

・Combat H

During combat, attacks from demons have a chance of breaking Mari's armor,

and once demons use H attack after that, "Combat H" will be triggered.

When receiving H attack, Mari's Energy(EP) will be absorbed by demons, and her Ecstasy and Ero level will increase.

In addition, in some combat H, specific Debuffs will lead to unique variations.

・Ecstasy System

When receiving H attack in combat, "Ecstasy" will increase.

When Ecstasy reaches 100, Mari cums and becomes unable to move for one turn.

However, her energy will be replenished, and her Max EP, ATK, and SP(Sorcery ATK) will increase by 1.

・Lust System

When receiving H attacks, being raped after defeated, and doing lewd things in Events,

Mari's "Lust" will increase.

When Lust is at a certain degree, "Ero Level" will increase, and Mari's reaction in H Scenes will change correspondingly.

・Debuff System

Among the demons, some can apply Debuffs on Mari.

When receiving these attacks, Debuffs such as "Lactating" or "Infested" might be applied.

These Debuffs will not only put Mari at a disadvantage in combat, but also trigger specific H Scenes that have unique variations.

  • Operate with either mouse or keyboard.

  • Pressing the shift key during battle activates auto-battle. Pressing it again reverts the command.

  • Ero Status and Memory Room are also available.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Exorcists are those who protect people from demons. What will happen to Mari, the exorcist, on her journey to defeat these erotic demons?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
